CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT( Repair_Status__c ) = "Finished" || TODAY() <= Expected_End_Date__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif","green",15,30),
IF(TEXT( Repair_Status__c ) <> "Finished" && TODAY() <= Expected_End_Date__c + 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif","yellow",15,30),
IF(TEXT( Repair_Status__c ) <> "Finished" && TODAY() > Expected_End_Date__c + 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif","red",15,30),"")))
CustomField.label: Condition
